channel.title: IPhone 5
channel.description:
What a let down that was. Everything that the iPhone 5 offers, should have been included in the 4S release. Usually I look forward to IPhone events. Usually some great new toy comes about, making you go wow. No, not this time.
Personally, I'll be waiting for the BB10 which looks promising from what I've seen.
Opinions on the new device?

item.title: IPhone 5
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“Rix_, post:20, topic:460070”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=562982.msg4104666#msg4104666 date=1347835455]The popularity in their devices is only going to decrease as the companies around them up their specs and deliver more innovative features.
[/quote]
http://i.imgur.com/b0TwG.jpg[/quote]
I don’t see how any of the figures there show a decrease in their marketshare…? Can’t make much sense of that line graph. Though I do believe they’re going to peak either at this generation of iPhone or the next.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 5
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Total lack of innovation in Apple recently, which was what it was renowned for. The popularity in their devices is only going to decrease as the companies around them up their specs and deliver more innovative features.

And until they reduce the ridiculous amounts of security and limitations on the operating system itself, I will always stick with Android.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 5
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Si Force, post:14, topic:460070”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=562982.msg4104575#msg4104575 date=1347829712]

Being honest i’m happy with my blackberry curve, but I do agree that this iPhone was a let down. I guess we’ve come to expect great things and new features that will blow our minds. It’s a good thing that there’s decent competition in the Samsung S3 and the up and coming Blackberry 10.

You actually like your blackberry? Don’t you get any issues with it?
[/quote]

Nope, nothing major has happened to my phone really. I found that if you press any buttons while trying to load the app world the phone freezes but apart from that the phone has been relatively problem free.[/quote]

Wish mines was as good as that, mines is a pain in the ass. I bought it primarily for BBM and then realised how shit it was and now I’ve been regretting it for the past 13 months.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 5
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:13, topic:460070”][quote author=Si Force link=topic=562982.msg4104557#msg4104557 date=1347828358]
Being honest i’m happy with my blackberry curve, but I do agree that this iPhone was a let down. I guess we’ve come to expect great things and new features that will blow our minds. It’s a good thing that there’s decent competition in the Samsung S3 and the up and coming Blackberry 10.
[/quote]

You actually like your blackberry? Don’t you get any issues with it?[/quote]

Nope, nothing major has happened to my phone really. I found that if you press any buttons while trying to load the app world the phone freezes but apart from that the phone has been relatively problem free.

Read full topic

item.title: IPhone 5
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Tree, post:5, topic:460070”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=562982.msg4104011#msg4104011 date=1347798944]

Even the video ranted on about nothing, while revealing only 3 or 4 new features.
However, Apple will stil do well from it all. Their marketing abilities are great. I’m fairly sure they depleted their pre order stock 60 minutes in. The other editions took 20+ hours.

It’s still better than my blackberry though, that’s a total pile of ass.
[/quote]

Yeah, the older BBs fell short. Have a look at BB10 that they’re releasing in the first quarter. It’s all out-of-the-box thinking.

If they fail this time around, they pretty much get knocked out. I suppose that’s why they’ve made two delays on the release date already. To make sure it’s a game changer for them.

It’s rumoured that the hardware will rival or outdo the s3. Not that I’ve ever really been limited by hardware with anything that’s been released in the past three years.[/quote]

The BB10 looks nice, my Curve barely works if I’m honest. It’s only 14 months old (2 year contract) and it’s always freezing, white screening and rebooting itself.

Si Force:

Being honest i’m happy with my blackberry curve, but I do agree that this iPhone was a let down. I guess we’ve come to expect great things and new features that will blow our minds. It’s a good thing that there’s decent competition in the Samsung S3 and the up and coming Blackberry 10.

You actually like your blackberry? Don’t you get any issues with it?

Read full topic
